attributes.action:
Let the people decide ”DEAL OR NO DEAL”!

Time for the nation to decide!
attributes.additional_details: It is clear that our government and the opposition can not come to an agreement on Brexit. The people voted to leave and is it not now time that the people decided how, and give our government and opposition clear instruction how to move forward.
attributes.background: The government and the opposition have had three years to deliver Brexit and have been unable to deliver! Is it not time to put the decision back to the people? The only question that should be asked is do we leave with Boris Johnson’s deal or no deal. As the nation has already decided to leave!
